section.name: Welcome to OpenEngSB!
section.p: The Open Engineering Service Bus (OpenEngSB) project provides an easy-to-use platform for engineering tool integration. It offers domain-based workflow design for reoccurring integration tasks, freeing an engineer's time for creative work.

div.span:
ABOUT
Read the introduction and still no idea? Get an in-depth look on what OpenEngSB can offer in the About section.

DOWNLOAD
Looking for the latest version of OpenEngSB? Download the the package for your plattform of choice here.

DOCUMENTATION
Interested in using OpenEngSB? Get answers to frequently asked questions, access handy HowTo's and tutorials or read the online documentation.

CONTRIBUTE
OpenEngSB is actively being developed and there are many opportunities to get involved. See the source repository and issue tracker for hard facts.

SOCIAL
Looking for OpenEngSB's growing community? Take a look on the mailing lists. Also, you may want to follow us on Facebook and Twitter for updates and latest news.
